roleset.name: avoid
roleset.note: PICKET-V NOTES: Frames file for 'picket' based on sentences in ECTB. No Verbnet entry found. Comparison to 'boycott' and Verbnet entry 52. (from picket.01-v predicate notes)

example.text: ... laid-off workers taking extreme measures of protest such as * lying down on railroad tracks and picketing factories.
